// {{{ NX.String.replace

/**
 * @class NX.String
 */

/**
 * @method replace
 *
 * "write it"
 *
 * @param o {Object} xxx
 * @return {Object}
 */
module.exports = function(v, findme, repl) {

    findme = NX.String.escapeRegex(findme);

    var re = new RegExp(findme, 'g');

    return v.replace(re, repl);
};

// }}}

/*
 * Local variables:
 * tab-width: 4
 * c-basic-offset: 4
 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
 * End:
 */
